data.actual_result: a discord icon is there instead
data.expected_result: The same icon as used by default in DMs (three people in blurple) is shown
data.short_description: Group DMs have the wrong logo in the group dm settings when none is set
data.steps_to_repro: - Get invited to a group dm or make one. It must not have a set group picture (!) - Go into group settings
